member.summary: Creates a new account.

member.response: Account not found with the specified id.

member.name: M:Vinance.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Update(Vinance.Api.Viewmodels.Account.UpdateAccountViewmodel)
member.summary: Updates the given account.
member.response: Account not found with the specified id.

member.name: M:Vinance.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the given account.
member.param: The id of the account to be deleted.
member.response: Account not found with the specified id.

member.name: M:Vinance.Api.Controllers.AccountController.GetDailyBalances(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{Vinance.Contracts.Enums.AccountType},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the daily balance of active accounts for all days between the specified dates.
member.param: The id of the account (if not specified, all of the accounts daily balances are returned).
The type of the accounts (if not specified, all of the accounts' daily balances are returned).
The starting date (if not specified, the last 30 days' daily balances are returned).
The ending date (if not specified, the last 30 days' daily balances are returned).
